video.title: Blazor Server App with .NET 6 and Syncfusion UI Components – Full Course
video.description:
Learn how to harness the power of the Syncfusion UI components from within a Blazor server application. We’ll also integrate the Microsoft Identity technology into our Blazor application to leverage login, registration, authorization and authentication functionality. Syncfusion provides a UI component suite for building powerful web, desktop, and mobile apps.

✏️ Gavin Lon created this course. https://www.youtube.com/c/gavinlon

🔗 Free Syncfusion Community License: https://www.syncfusion.com/sales/communitylicense

💻 Code for full application: https://github.com/GavinLonDigital/SalesManagementApp

⭐️ Syncfusion Components Integrated into the Sales Management Application ⭐️
🔗 DataGrid: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/datagrid/getting-started
🔗 Spinner: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/spinner/getting-started

🔗 Diagram: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/diagram-component/getting-started

⭐️ Copy Code from GitHub ⭐️

topLevelComment.author: Gavin Lon
topLevelComment.text: Over the years, when confronted with a project where a sophisticated user interface is required on the web, it has often been rather challenging and time consuming to address such requirements. For e.g we may wish to express metrics on a bar chart or we may wish  to express data in a hierarchical structure on the UI. The Syncfusion UI components make it easy for us as developers to integrate such functionality into our applications. The components are highly customisable and are fine tuned for performance when dealing with high volumes of data. Developers can use the Syncfusion components to provide sophisticated, aesthetically pleasing UI functionality in their applications with ease and efficiency, which frees up the developer to focus on the business rules requirements of the application. A special thanks to FreeCodeCamp for allowing me to present this course. I thoroughly enjoyed creating it and I hope the viewers of this video will enjoy going through the course and benefit from it.
